pages.text: To find $(thing)Strongholds$(), one can use the abilities of the $(item)Eye of Ender$(), which will, upon being thrown, slowly move towards the nearest one of these structures, and in doing so, point the way to it. Similar behavior can be observed for the $(item)Eye of the Blaze$(), but, instead of finding strongholds, it will locate the closest $(thing)Nether Fortress$().
